divs: Sighting Detailswatching tv saw bright light in window.went to window thought it was a star but it did not seem right.looked again because it pulsated,VERY bright.got dressed then went outside.with my boys.got scope for better look seemed to be oval in shape with little individual lights in a oval not sure if it was the scope or object.all the while bright light would come from the top then bottom.saw one streak of red.tried to film it and did for 10 min but never had the rec. button on i wasnt thinking at the time so the only way i can put this down is to tell someone.that was it it was very strange.around 8 we had to pick up my daughter from family we were already late due to me watching this thing.when we left.i watched it for awhile till i couldnt see it came back 10 15 min later sky was clear.thats pretty much it it kinda freaked me and my boy out.
Summary: Hovering in sky somewhat low pulsating.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Shippensburg
This sighting has never been favorited.
